name: majascan
title: Majascan
description: (Trying to) detect malicious javascript as you browse.
author: Hauke Luebbers

preferences.title: XSS Test Code Detection
preferences.name: xssTest
preferences.description: Looks for typical Javascript code used to test for XSS vulnerabilities

preferences.title: Reflective XSS Detection in URL
preferences.name: xssReflectiveGET
preferences.description: Looks for JavaScript in the request URL to prevent reflective XSS

preferences.title: Reflective XSS Detection in POST data
preferences.name: xssReflectivePOST
preferences.description: Looks for JavaScript in the POST data to prevent reflective XSS
